name: Logistic Service Website
description1: Developed a dynamic and interactive website with an Authentication system where users can log in and create a new account.
description2: Contidional featured added as users can easily orders placed after successful login or user have to create a new account.
description3: Implemented dynamic featured as Admin panel, Manage service inventory, User review panel, Total orders collection. Users can track individual order tracking.
description4: Users can make payments by Stripe payment gateway and more exclusive featured as an individual control panel (Admin & Users).
technology: Technology Used: React JS, React Router, React Hooks, Context Api, Axios, JWT Token, Stripe payment gateway, Firebase, NodeJS(Express), MongoDB, Github, Heroku.

name: Book's E-commerce
description1: Modern web featured as the authentication system has developed that users can create new account and login.
description2: Build an interactive featured that users can easily add to cart and orders placed after successfully log in or users must have to login account.
description3: Most useful featured orders collection has implemented and developed the website's admin panel.
description4: Developed manage inventory system that products add, edit or delete unlimited.
technology: Technology Used: React JS, React Router, React Hooks, Context Api,  Firebase, NodeJS(Express), MongoDB, Github, Heroku.

name: Ride Sharing Website
description1: Developed a dynamic and interactive website with an Authentication system where users can log in and create a new account.
description2: Implemented ride-sharing featured that users can individually enjoy bike, car, metro-bus, and metro-rail.
description3: Most applicable featured that users can search destination location and implemented Google map.
technology: Technology Used: React JS, React Router, React Hooks, Context Api,  Firebase, Github, Heroku.
